text:
REMINDER:  As discussed in the recent TSC calls, we are in the process of locking down the next 3 Hackathons.  As such, if you plan on attending any/all of these, please indicate your preference/availability ASAP.  We will lock down the July Hackathon location by EOD tomorrow (6/20), and the others to follow shortly thereafter.

[July, Bay Area] Indicate preferred location (San Francisco or South San Jose) at <http://goo.gl/forms/ZjocapLj0qviMRor2> AND preferred dates for a 2-day event at <http://doodle.com/poll/g4yus3hdecg8rfvd>.  Note: the South San Jose option does not have hotel/restaurant options in the immediate vicinity.

[August, Virtual] Indicate preferred availability at <http://doodle.com/poll/r4ftyyvshef2rn6z>

[September/October, Amsterdam] Indicate preferred availability at <http://doodle.com/poll/y9h2e497essf9pg9>
